title: makevol
description: A tool to create a volume with given parameters.

filename.title: Filename
filename.description: Write volume to the given file name, implying type.

width.title: Width
width.description: Use integer WIDTH as the x dimension.

height.title: Height
height.description: Use integer HEIGHT as the y dimension.

depth.title: Depth
depth.description: Use integer DEPTH as the z dimension.

sizex.title: Size X
sizex.description: Use float SIZEX as the x resolution.

sizey.title: Size Y
sizey.description: Use float SIZEY as the y resolution.

sizez.title: Size Z
sizez.description: Use float SIZEZ as the z resolution.

set_method.title: Set Method
set_method.description: Use METHOD to fill the values. Methods: xyz, random, constant.
